Package com.scandilabs.catamaran.entity.support

Interface Summary
Identifiable Marker interface for objects that can be uniquely identified by a single id.
Persistable Defines an entity that knows how to persist itself
 

Class Summary
DefaultMySqlDataSource A datasource that defaults to the MySQL driver and default user, thus helping to make spring configurations shorter
DefaultSessionFactoryBean A session factory bean that sets various properties to sensible defaults, thus helping to make spring configurations shorter
EntityFinder  
EntityServicesContext A configuration-time object that allows for spring configuration of application services that are then statically injected into the parent class of entity objects.
IdentifiableBase Provides convenient default implementations of common java functions for Identifiable entities.
PersistableBase A base class for all persistent entity objects in an application.
PersistableUtils  
RepositoryBase A base class for Repository classes that provides convenience methods to extending repository classes.
 

Exception Summary
NotUniqueResultException Thrown when a single unique result was expected in a database query, but multiple matches were found
RepositoryObjectNotFoundException Thrown when a persistent entity cannot be found.
